mapper.sql: ID, ACC, PWD, SPEED, IP_ADDRESS, MAC_ADDRESS, NOTIFY_POLICY, INNER_VLAN, OUTER_VLAN, SERVICE_OPER, (SELECT NAME FROM ref_band_width WHERE ref_band_width.ID=SPEED) AS SPEED_DESC, (SELECT NAME FROM ref_notify_policy WHERE ref_notify_policy.ID=NOTIFY_POLICY) AS NOTIFY_POLICY_DESC, (SELECT NAME FROM ref_service_oper WHERE ref_service_oper.ID=SERVICE_OPER) AS SERVICE_OPER_DESC
mapper.insert: insert into crm_user_broad (ID, ACC, PWD, SPEED, IP_ADDRESS, MAC_ADDRESS, NOTIFY_POLICY, INNER_VLAN, OUTER_VLAN, SERVICE_OPER) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{macAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notifyPolicy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{innerVlan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outerVlan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceOper,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update crm_user_broad
ACC = #{acc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PWD = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPEED = #{speed,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IP_ADDRESS = #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SERVICE_OPER = #{serviceOper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
